definitions.definition: Tending to talk excessively about oneself.
Believing oneself to be better and more important than others due to one's position, popularity, wealth, appearance, etc.

labels: by confusion of the similar words
definitions.label_groups: nonstandard , by confusion of the similar words

main_definition: Tending to talk excessively about oneself.
secondary_definitions: Believing oneself to be better and more important than others due to one's position, popularity, wealth, appearance, etc.
( nonstandard , by confusion of the similar words ) Egoistical ( advocating egoism ) .
